mapper.select: select TA.*, TB.item_code, TB.item_name from bas_loc_area TA, bas_item TB where TA.item_id = TB.item_id and TA.wh_id = #{wh_id} and TB.owner_id in (#{owner_id_list}) --@ AND TA.loc_classify = #{loc_classify} --@ AND TA.lot12 like '%' || #{lot12} || '%' --@ AND TB.item_code like '%' || #{item_code} || '%' order by TB.item_code, TA.loc_classify, TA.lot12
